main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over Thackery, Ohio for 15 minutes on August 15, 1965.
interesting points: The object changed brilliance and appeared to move slowly in the sky,The witness described the object as resembling a bright star,There were no photographs or physical evidence recorded,The object disappeared briefly before returning to original intensity,The object was reported to be about 50 to 75 feet in diameter with an erratic motion observed.
sighted object: a bright point in the sky resembling a star
